context: My 5 year old loves the Pikmin mini game in Nintendoland do you think Pikmin 3 would be too advanced for her?

context: can you play this on a wii u? also can u play this off screen on the wii u gamepad?

context: Will the 2DS FIT IN THIS CASE?
